title: Ep. 139 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 5)
itunes:title: Ep. 139 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 5)
description:
Hey HBs! We're here with the 5th and FINAL part of A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas! We start with Elain's rescue, do lots of battles, SAVE THE WORLD, and end with sky sex (Melody is sure of it). Enjoy! 
 Bonus Content: Oreos are a finite resource in Erin's house, foxes wearing cute vests!, Erin hates on Feyre's new tramp stamp, Melody talks about HORNS, and ***Family Redemption!!!***
 Support Protesters by  DONATING to Bail Funds all over the US. 
 HBs have started a new  Book Club to learn more about internalized white supremacy and racial inequality. Join it! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: Music from Nerd Out and treating this quarantine like the Ouro Boros. You might be seeing your worst self right now and radical self love is necessary. 
 Erin: Oreo-o Boros. If you're an eat-the-whole-package-of-Oreos-in-1-day kind of person, maybe put them in a slightly inconvenient place. 
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

Hey HBs! We're here with the 5th and FINAL part of A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas! We start with Elain's rescue, do lots of battles, SAVE THE WORLD, and end with sky sex (Melody is sure of it). Enjoy! 

Bonus Content: Oreos are a finite resource in Erin's house, foxes wearing cute vests!, Erin hates on Feyre's new tramp stamp, Melody talks about HORNS, and ***Family Redemption!!!***

Support Protesters by DONATING to Bail Funds all over the US. 

HBs have started a new Book Club to learn more about internalized white supremacy and racial inequality. Join it! 

Lady Loves: 

Melody: Music from Nerd Out and treating this quarantine like the Ouro Boros. You might be seeing your worst self right now and radical self love is necessary. 

Erin: Oreo-o Boros. If you're an eat-the-whole-package-of-Oreos-in-1-day kind of person, maybe put them in a slightly inconvenient place.
